com.example.pitchperfectlyaccuratelypractice.fragments

Class GeneralFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • com.example.pitchperfectlyaccuratelypractice.fragments.GeneralFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IntervalFragment, NoteFragment, NoteGraphFragment, TriadFragment

    public class GeneralFragment
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
    general fragment, its children are notefragment, intervalfragment, triadfragment, notegraphfragment

    A simple Fragment subclass. Activities that contain this fragment must implement the TriadFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener interface to handle interaction events. Use the newInstance(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) factory method to create an instance of this fragment.

      • updateQuestionTexts

        public void updateQuestionTexts(java.lang.String[] texts)
        update question texts

        A note has one text ("A4") A interval has two texts ("A4", "+ m3") A triad has three texts ("C3", "E3", "G3")

        Parameters:
        texts -
